pages.text: $(li)The Rabbit Foot is an item that can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/leaping)Potion of Jump Boost$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/cleric)Clerics$(/l) will exchange your Rabbit's Foot by $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emerald$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/rabbit)Rabbits$(/l) may drop this item on death.
